issues.message: This uses a cryptographically insecure random number generated at [Math.random()](1) in a security context.

rule.name: js/insecure-randomness
rule.full_description: Using a cryptographically weak pseudo-random number generator to generate a security-sensitive value may allow an attacker to predict what value will be generated.
